🔨 Thesis-UI 是什么？ ​

一个基于 Vite 的 UI 组件库

Features ​

  • 🌩Vue3, Vite,pnpm,ESBuild - born with fastness
  • TypeScript，of course
  • File based routing
  • UnoCSS - the instant on demand atomic CSS engiee
  • Unit Test with vitest

Install ​

bash
npm install thersis-ui

Browser Sopport ​
